website_summaries.verdict: Not only will you appreciate the  versatility of this board, but you'll also love the unique design that makes it fun and challenging for just about any user.
pros: Stands out for its patented design that allows you to adjust the platform to fit various skill levels for different workouts
Doesn't require tools to change the base
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the spectrum, but you get a lot of features for the cost

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing desk; balancing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a standing desk. It works great for that. Also great for workouts. I absolutely love this thing. I like that I can change the challenge level easily, and that it doesn’t fling me off (I’m rather klutzy). Only thing, I wish the yellow and red modules had finger holes, as well. But it’s not that much of a hassle. Overall, wonderful addition to my home fitness plan.
customer_reviews.author: Auri

customer_reviews.title: Very cool balance board with a lot of uses
customer_reviews.text: I got this balance board primarily for use with my standup desk because of it's versatility. With no Balance Modules inserted, the board only has side to side movement. As you add the progressively harder Green, Yellow, and Red Balance Modules, you introduce more heel/toe action, in addition to the side to side movement. I've also used it for pushups and body weight squats (usually in between breaks from my standing desk). It's very durable. Overall, it is a great way to help maintain good posture, fight foot fatigue, and keep active and energized for a long day of standing.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Gaydos

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and poor craftsmanship but will do the job
customer_reviews.text: This is way overpriced. It’s a nice design and unique but probably cost about $25 to mass manufacture in China. Nothing wrong with Mfg in China but the marketing goes to great lengths to make it look like a small company in Hawaii. The brand logo looks like it was stamped on with a home ink stamp kit and the whole effect is poor quality. The plastic inserts don’t fit perfectly into the bottom. There is a wide array of price points in this genre and this is way overpriced for the quality. That said I still gave it a 3 because I will be able to use it. Just feel like a got taken in, paying $180 including tax.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Great way to improve balance
customer_reviews.text: The board is useful for helping with balance for anyone - someone recovering from surgery to a competitive athlete who needs excellent balance. The board is well constructed and is larger than many, making it easy to use for all foot sizes. The ability to change the difficulty makes this very flexible
customer_reviews.author: HeleneS

customer_reviews.title: Versatility!
customer_reviews.text: I current use for both Training and Coaching, and could not be happier! Well made simple to use. I use at my office with my Standup Desk, as well to get some cycles in while in office-mode. I plan to order again whether it is an improved version or just to replace existing ones. Many mahalos to the Blue Planet crew for idea and execution!
customer_reviews.author: mcadiz23

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile, but needs more finger slots for removal
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying how adjustable the board is with the 7 balance modes & ability for heel to toe practice too. I think there could be an improvement in the modules if each one included a finger slot/hole on each side to aid in removal. Only my green module has finger slots on all sides, but my yellow & red modules have no slots at all & my red module is now stuck in the board.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the BPBS.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the BPBS for a couple of weeks now and I'm very happy with it. Leave it out in central part of house where I'm always walking by it, so I'll always stop and stand on it for a few minutes. Still on the green module, but have tried them all. Its well built and easy to use. Really think this is going to help with my new years resolution to up my SUS game this year.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I was looking for a balance board for my standup desk at home. It’s great that it has multiple levels to work up to and standing is more fun! The construction is solid! Such a big fan going to buy another one for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: My favorite balance board ever!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! All ages and skill levels too. The look and feel of the board is exactly what I've wanted.. just wasn't available until Blue Planet Surf built it! Thank you. Love: skate deck aspect; wider deck (great for stand up desk); simple, smart design; light weight; feels safer than old school balance boards (which is a good thing, ha)
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Bride

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to home office
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this with my home office standup desk and really like it. It’s a well made product. Being able to switch out the bottoms piece to adjust difficulty levels allows my wife to use it as well.
customer_reviews.author: hepuwal

customer_reviews.title: Well made board
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it much yet. First impressions It’s a very well made board. I got the black board, no slip. I have a size 16 shoe and it fits my feet fine. It seems like it will be fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fledgling Skater
customer_reviews.text: Over the summer I had surgery on my foot, so I wasn't able to take my board out and practice. I use this mainly when I'm folding laundry on our tallish bed. Now that I'm out of the walking boot, I can turn the block to work on my heel-toe balance so when i get back on my skateboard, hopefully I'll have developed that balance a little more. Looks sharp, nice surf vibe to it. Good grip. Easy to change the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke E. Habecker

customer_reviews.title: Great, Pricey BUT base of board is malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: Great, Pricey BUT base of board is malfunctioning. The tape is falling off after 2 weeks of use. Damaging both the board and floor. I’m concerned this is a safety issue. I’m not sure what to do because I really love the board.
customer_reviews.author: Mariska

customer_reviews.title: Badass board!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this board. I use it at work while on the computer and just for fun during breaks. Definitely give you a good workout and helps with balance/agility when I can’t be on the water. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Smith III

customer_reviews.title: Easy 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I’m not as gifted as many others with balance, so I appreciate the different level options. I have a standup desk at work so I’ll probably buy another. Also very sturdy and well made. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rossoni

customer_reviews.title: From a great company..
customer_reviews.text: I have bouncy half-balls, roller boards (wear wrist guards!) and recently got this unit. If you were only 'buying a balance' board, there are cheaper. But, Blue Planet is one of the few companies left that seem to put product before profit. You cannot tell it from this single listing, but Robert in Hawaii probably puts more time and effort to supply us waterfolks high quality ranging from surfboards, SUP boards and, the latest craze, foiling. ..both boards and foils. See his posts on Youtube and, if you buy this, you will not be disappointed. Jim - about 8 time zones away
customer_reviews.author: JimCan

customer_reviews.title: Best balance board ever!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome build quality and versatility. This is so much better than I expected. The EVA foam on the deck is perfect for my barefoot balance training. Switching between level of difficulty is a snap and means anyone can use it right out of the box. Very stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Kubo

customer_reviews.title: Got it through Kickstarter and it's fantastic
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. Backed it through Kickstarter last year and already bought a second one for family!! If you are looking for the most versatile and high quality balance board, look no further!!
customer_reviews.author: M Hum

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the attachments, you basically have 7 levels of difficulty for this thing. It’s a ton of fun to use. I also really like how much surface space you have.
customer_reviews.author: ez

customer_reviews.title: This is brilliant....especially during lockdown!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different stages or challenge levels to work your way up to the red level. To add some fun and complexity why not try juggling at the same time? So far have managed it only up to the medium or yellow level....but still practicing.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Copinger-symes

product_meta.title: Blue Planet Balance Surfer 7-in-1 Bamboo Wooden Balance Board Trainer for Office, Gym & Home | Great for Standing Desks, Surfing, SUP, Yoga, Exercise!
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE BALANCE BOARD FROM BLUE PLANET SURF: Expertly crafted, patent pending 7-in-1 toolless design, 360 degree balance radius and quality bamboo construction, this is the most innovative balance board on the market! Excellent for standing desks and balance training for Surf, Dance, Yoga, Sports, Physical Therapy and more!

STRENGTHEN YOUR CORE, IMPROVE BALANCE, POSTURE AND COORDINATION: The Balance Surfer, with regular use, develops core strength, encourages muscle growth, joint flexibility, posture and balance in a natural, non-painful manner. The balance surfer makes getting the exercise you need a blast!

FUN, EFFECTIVE, EXERCISE YOU CAN DO ANYWHERE: The Balance Surfer 2D mode is excellent for standing desks and yoga while the 3 included 3D balance modules each have 2 curvature directions for different exercises and challenge levels, offering a total of 7 configurations. Compact design and toolless assembly means you can play anywhere, anytime!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR BALANCE BOARD WITH NON SLIP SURFACE TRACTION: We offer 3 different deck grips for the balance surfer so you can find your perfect traction. Choose between soft and grippy EVA Foam, ideal for barefoot use -or- Clear Skate or Black Skate Grip offering great traction, ideal for use with shoes.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: Blue Planet has been in business for 25 years and we take customer satisfaction very seriously, we want you to love our products! If for any reason you aren’t 100% happy with the Balance Surfer, return it no questions asked for a full refund within the first 30 days.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
